mapper.select: select pd_id as pdId, pd_three_id as pdthreeId, pd_no as pdNo, pd_name as pdName, pd_price as pdPrice, pd_cover as pdCover, pd_date as pdDate from product
select pd_id as pdId, pd_three_id as pdthreeId, pd_no as pdNo, pd_name as pdName, pd_price as pdPrice, pd_cover as pdCover, pd_date as pdDate from product where pd_id=#{pdId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_emp ( pd_three_id as pdthreeId, pd_no as pdNo, pd_name as pdName, pd_price as pdPrice, pd_cover as pdCover, pd_date as pdDate ) values ( #{pdthreeId}, #{pdNo}, #{pdName}, #{pdPrice}, #{pdCover}, #{pdDate} )
mapper.update: update product set pd_three_id =#{pdthreeId}, pd_name =#{pdName}, pd_price =#{pdPrice}, pd_cover =#{pdCover}, pd_date =#{pdDate} where pd_id=#{pdId}
